title: Admiral Refrigerator Door Switch
description: Admiral Refrigerator Door Switch ★★★★★ ★★★★★ 88 Reviews PartSelect Number PS12728638 Manufacturer Part Number W11384469 Door switch turns the light off when you close the door.

installationInstructions.author: Clint from Rayville, MO
installationInstructions.title: Lights inside refrigerator not working
installationInstructions.content: I used a flat-head screwdriver to pop out the old light rocker switch.  Then, I unplugged the wires, plugged them into the new light rocker switch, and then popped the new switch into the hole.  That's it!  Lights began working again.
